transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji Amit Saini ji se baat kar rahe hain, Saharanpur?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji Amit ji, good afternoon, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Amit sir, ${Exec_Name} bol raha hu IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu, ye main jara aapke IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir actually ye kisi ka ek update aaya hua tha, aapka ek concern open hua tha regarding the process. Yaha par mujhe dikha raha tha ki aap inse request ki thi ki isko pehle process karwa dijiye sir, right?
Customer: Kya karwa le?
Executive: Refund process karne ke liye aap inse request. Haan ji haan ji, ji sir, please sir.
Executive: Actually main check kar raha tha sir is service aap logo ne kuch problems ko usme laya hua hai, right? To actually abhi kya hai ki sir reason jante to aap refund kyu chahte hain sir aap?
Customer: Sir sabse pehle to refund ye hai ke jo mere paas Navesh sir aaye the.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: To sir unhone, unhone mujhe ye kaha tha ke aapko ₹2 lakh monthly ka kaam diya jayega.
Executive: Achcha, ye to aapko ₹2 lakh monthly ka kaam milega.
Customer: Haan ji, ye ye ye kiya gaya tha. Main 4 saal se IndiaMART par meri company dali hui thi. Magar mujhe logo ne ye kaha tha ki bhai IndiaMART par aapko kaam nahi milne ka.
Customer: Achcha.
Customer: Kahin se kahin tak bhi nahi milne ka. Maine socha main kaha chalo yaar 4 saal ho gaye ye log aa rahe hain, aa rahe hain baar baar.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Chalo bhai tumne kar lo jab wo phir wo Navesh sir ne mujhe ye kaha ke ₹2 lakh monthly ka meri misses yahi baithi hui thi. ₹2 lakh monthly ka kaam milega. Maine kaha sir mujhe ₹2 lakh ki bhi avashyakta nahi mujhe to ₹1 lakh monthly ka aap kaam de do main aap se sada ke liye juda rahunga.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Maine ye baat kahi thi. To phir unhone kaha nahi sir aap tension free kar do. Aap vishwas nahi karoge sir main to paise bhi vyaj pe la kar ke diye the usme ₹32-33,000 kitne the uss samay. Aur chalo koi baat nahi maine vishwas kiya bhai banda bol raha hai aur achche se matlab mujhe unhone badhiya achche tarike se samjhaya. Phir ladki mere paas jo manager mili Simran ji mili. Main ye nahi kahunga jo achcha hoga use main achcha kahunga. Simran ji ne mujhe bade achche se guide kiya bechari ne. Ishwar uska bhala kare usne mujhe samjhaya ki bhaiya aap aise lead uthao aise karo aise karo mujhe kuch nahi aata tha dekho starting mein to aapko pata jab kisi kaam ko jante to kaise pata lagega. Phir usne ladki ne mujhe bahut achche se samjhaya. Main phir daily usne mujhe kaha tha kehne lage bhaiya aap subah ko 9:00 baje se le kar ke 1:00 baje tak na aap alert raha karo aur lead uthaya karo aap. Maine kaha thik hai babu maine kaha beta main aise hi karunga. Nahi mere to kuch samajh mein aata tha to main usko call karta tha wo mujhe handle karti thi dekho jis bande ki tarif hai main tarif karunga ji dekho.
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: Us budhiya ne mera bahut achcha sath diya phir main usne din mera manager change kar diya. Magar sir mere sath mein kya problem aayi jin logo ko maine call ki. Call karne ke baad mein kya hua Odisha se call aayi maine balki aap kahoge to main aapke paas mein bhi WhatsApp kar dunga. Phir call banda Odisha se bol raha hai. Uske baad mein usko sham ko main dusre number se phone kiya to dusre number se usne bataya main Kandale se bol raha hu. To hamari samajh se bahar ho gayi humne kam se kam 10-12 humne bhi wo kar rakhi hai humne wo kya naam hai recording. Magar hamare kabje se bahar ho gaya hume hume hamare ko hume gussa aane laga humne kaha are ye to fraud call hai mujhe to pehle hi bataya tha kisi ne fraud call aati hai aise aise kar ke baat hai. To main is baat par vishwas nahi kiya sir magar jab mujhe khud ko maine dekha mujhe vishwas nahi sir maine lead nahi uthai kam se kam aap dekh lo check kar lo. Computer pe mujhe kam se kam ek mahina ho gaya maine kuch nahi kiya phir Kavita ji hai pata nahi kya naam hai unka sir jo manager mili hui.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Unki call aayi mere paas kehne lage bhaiya main aapke paas mein wo lead utha kar ke bhejti hu jo achchi lead hai. Usne mere paas lead bheji. Maine jaise usne unhone mere paas paanch lead bheji maine turant call kiya jo lead bheji. Aur jo turant jo call kiya usne kaha usne usme likh rakha hai main business karta hu.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur mujhe 150 botal ka order chahiye. Maine us par call kiya aur recording ki aur usme recording mein usne ye bola hai ke main sir main to customer hu. Aur wo ek saal se activate hai hamari us par IndiaMART par. Usne man liya ek piece chahiye bande ko aur 150 piece ka order laga hua hai. Maine phir uske paas mein video recording bheji. Wo kehne lage bhaiya main puch kar ke batati hu ab tak to kisi ne kuch bataya nahi kal maine phir phone Kavita ji aise aadmi hai wo jo mere ko 96 mein 96 number mila hua hai. To maine un par call ki. To unhone mujhe kaha kehne lage maine kaha bhai dekh lo bhai main to payment chahta hu mujhe ab dekho refund chahiye mujhe mujhe kaam nahi karna kyuki mujhe response 1% bhi nahi mila. 1% bhi sir agar mujhe response milta sir to main refund nahi dekho ek baat batao sir aap khud samajhdar ho bhai jab kaam milega to refund kyu le raha hu mujhe ye batao imandari se aap. Bhai hamara to vyaj vyaj pehle hi chadh raha hai humne vyaj pe paise la kar ke diye. Aapne hamare vyavhar se bhi dekh liya hoga sir humne to un par vishwas kiya tha bhai kaam denge humne to ye samjha chalo bhai jab banda bol raha hai to bhai kaam denge to isse achchi to koi baat nahi hai hume bhi bhai hume to kaam ki jarurat hai. Batao sir hamare sath mein itna ye sir but ek chhoti si cheez hai actually kya hai jab aapko first month mein hi business nahi mila tha na jo unhone bola tha ₹2 lakh ka milega right? I think aapko usi samay par refund ka request dal dena chahiye tha. Abhi kya hai ki aapke teen se char mahine already nikal chuke hain. Hamari jo refund ki policy hai right wo starting ke 30 days mein ya 60 days ke liye to hum ek baar ko consider kar lete hain right? Abhi kya hai ki aapka jo already catalog hai na char mahine purana ho chuka hai aur hamare paas maturity ke basis pe to sach batau refund ki koi policy nahi hoti hai. Main aapko bekar mein jhoot bolu hamare paas agar koi customer bolta hai ki hume business nahi mil raha hai right? Hum us basis pe refund nahi dete hain. Hamare paas simple ek cheez hai ki ha hum services use kijiye aapne 12 mahine ke liye package diya tha 12 mahine mein aapko koi bhi response achcha aa sakta hai aap services ko bas effectively use kijiye.
Customer: Sir.
Customer: Sir.
Customer: Sir.
Customer: Sir.
Executive: To sir aisa hai dekho hume to itna time nahi hai hum to dekho us chakkar mein padte nahi sir mein dard hai tumhari lead uthao. Lead utha kar ke wo wo wo man liya. Sir suno to sir dard bol rahe hain suniye to jaise aap sir dard bol rahe hain na sir usse kam se kam kuch nahi to ek se ₹2 lakh customer IndiaMART se business le rahe hain wo sir bhi lead utha rahe hain sir dard nahi hai jis din aapko usi lead se kisi se bhi ek se business mil jayega na sir aap khud ba khud lead uthayenge wo to ye hai ki aapka conversion nahi hua is vajah se aap pareshan hai ya phir wo ladka jo aapke paas aaya tha wo ₹2 lakh ki expectation kar ke gaya aur aapne bola nahi mujhe ₹1 lakh mil jaye wo bhi bahut hai right wo aapka badappan hai lekin aapko jab usne commitment kiya tha na to aapko usi waqt pe puchna chahiye tha ki mujhe likhit mein de diya usne kahi likhit ₹2 lakh ka business har mahine milega. Dekho sir ek baat suno aapne mere vyavhar ko dekh liya hoga aisi baat nahi hai aap aap achche samajhdar ho aapke baat karne ke tarike se samajh mein aa raha hai ki aapne bahut mehnat se kar loan leke kisi se paisa diya IndiaMART ko aur aapne services ko active karaya. Thank you so much for that right sir but hamare process mein na hum kisi ko bhi conversion ki guarantee dete hi nahi hai agar koi Chalo sir koi baat nahi chalo hum koi hum to amir nahi hone ke aap nahi amir hone ke koi baat nahi agar man liya aage aap apni team se best to best kaam kara ke do aapke catalog mein jo bhi gaps mujhe aur dikhte hain wo sahi kara saku. Sir dusre number par ek baat aur batao mujhe chalo agar main yaha nahi samajh pa raha hu ek baat socho manager chalo mere paas mein call karta hai wo achchi baat hai wo ladki jo aapne de rakhi hai wo call karti hai main ye nahi kahunga jo upar se call aa rahi hai wo to aa rahi hai. Ek baar bhi Navesh sir agar aaye ho yaha jo ladka sath aaya tha usne bhi kaam chhod diya waha se. Wahi wahi main bol raha hu na ki jis aadmi ne aapko ye confirmation diya tha right aap usse return mein le lete agar wo return mein hota na to ek baar to main uske senior ko uske senior ko mail kar ke ye cheez update to kar pata na ki bhai yeble pending hai aur ye cheez aise aise hai aapne inhe return mein diya ₹2 lakh ka business milega aur company mein kabhi bhi return commitment deti nahi hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Ji sir to basically kya hai ki hamare paas mein conversion ki guarantee hum kisi ko bhi nahi dete hain basically. Baat ye hai.
Customer: Chalo sir koi baat nahi koi baat nahi jaise hum to dekho apne kist de rahe hain aapki to humne de di thi ₹33-34,000 ki hum jo jaha se humne paise uthaye uski bhi de rahe hain bhagwan aap logo ka sabka bhala kare koi baat nahi baki hume bada dukh hai is baat ka ki hum puja path wale aadmi hamare sath mein itna bada dhokha hua hum to shayad ho sakta hai pata nahi humne kaha par galti ki hogi jo hume dhokha mila. Jo aapko aisa lag raha hai ki dhokha hua hai aapke catalog pe working kara rahe hain aapko business automatically milega aapke catalog mein jo bhi gaps hai wo. Magar sir main sir main ek baat keh raha hu main apne office par baitha hu sachche dil se. Meri aatma na sach mein dukhi hai is mamle mein kyuki main ek chota sa bada businessman bhi aap kahoge na aap video call kar ke dekho. Main bahut chota sa businessman hu maine pata nahi kaise kaise kar ke ek apna sapna sajaya tha bhai chalo mujhe kaam milega ishwar ki kripa se chalo aur log mere sath mein jud gaye online par jud gaye jaise bhi kuch isse achcha to thoda bahut mera kaam facebook se aur usme instagram se chal raha tha ₹2-4000 ka order milta tha chalo wo to mera jaise taise chal raha tha. Jo ye instagram facebook aur social media ke naam le rahe hain na in sab mein sabse upar hai IndiaMART aap agar google pe ja ke apni company ka naam dalenge na sir to hai aap meri baat suno aapko abhi business nahi aaya aap is vajah se naraz hai right mera sirf yahi kehna hai ki ye jo business conversion hai na sir bahut subjective matter hota hai kis cheez pe na konsi cheez aapke buyer ko pasand aa jaye aapki aur business mil jaye right ye aap define hi nahi kar sakte aapke catalog mein jo cheeze aapne dali hui hai aur inhe kaise kar sakte hain taki aapko business achcha mile right wo hamara hamesha prayas hoga jab tak aapka ek saal ka catalog chal raha hai aap itni jaldi give up mat kijiye ga services ko achche se use kijiye aur ensure karte hain ki sir ₹2 lakh chodo ₹5 lakh ka business nikalenge but hume bas wait dena hai services karne se hum conversion nikal denge.
Customer: Sir.
Executive: Sir.
Executive: Sir.
Customer: Sir mere paas abhi kijiye ga aapko business bhi milega sir. Sir mere product bade hain kam se kam aath. Haan to aap bech bech do na sir. Nahi nahi product suno to meri baat main bhejta to tab jab mujhe kuch response hota. Man mujhe response nahi mil pa raha kisi cheez ka ab ek baat aap khud samajhdar ho sir aisi baat nahi aap bahut samajhdar lag rahe hain mujhe magar aap mujhe ek baat bataiyega sir thoda sa meri baat ek second ko suno agar man liya dekho aapne bola mujhe social media wali baat boli ki aap waha se jude ho dekho sir ek chhote se doctor par patient jata hai aur ek bade par ja raha hai bade ke yaha thik nahi ho pa raha chhote par wo thik ho jata hai to uske liye to bhagwan wo ho gaya chhote wala to yahi baat mere liye to mere liye to IndiaMART aur facebook social media yahi mere liye bahut achcha hai IndiaMART se mujhe kuch bhi nahi jab mujhe kaam nahi mila agar mujhe kaam milta to main 10 logo ko kehta yaar mujhe IndiaMART par itne lakh ka itne hazar ka kaam mila sir mujhe agar waha se ₹50,000 ka ek baar bhi kaam mil jata ₹20,000 ka mil jata mujhe lagan ho jati hai ha bhai yaar kaam hai aapke paas 9 se aath mahine baki hain use definitely business achcha milega. Sir ek baat suno ji wo to tab kare dimag kharab ho jaye sir agar kisi ke paas call kare na wo wo rate aisa mange aap vishwas nahi karoge are sarso ka tel kya rupee liter hai mujhe ye batao ₹240-50 ₹250-300 liter ho raha sarso ka tel agla mang raha mere se kehne lage ji dijoint oil de do mujhe ₹30 ka wo kya naam 100 ml bhai main use kaha se de dunga kahi palm bhar ke dunga use maine to apne mein mehnat kar rakhi khud mein. Redi se laga rahe ek ek nahi sir ek ek capsule hua Odisha se chalo ji tay ho gaya usne humne kaha bhai tum kitne paise ka loge kehne lage main to uski costing hume pad rahi ₹1.20 paise ki humne use kaha chal tu ₹1 ka denge order laga usne kaha ji main 2000 order laga raha bhai payment done kar de ab usne apna phir phone uthana band kar diya ab batao kya kaisi deal kar sake kya kar sakte hain batao sir aap khud samajh karo agar bar bar ha ji koi nahi main ek kaam kar raha hu aapke catalog ko working kara diya hu theek hai na aur jo bhi aap khud samajhdar ho prabhu ji meri baat dhyan se suno agar man liya hum aise pareshan honge to hum to lead khud hi nahi uthane baat samajhiye sab baat pareshani ki nahi hai aapki aap jo pareshani bata rahe hain wo samajh sakta hu lekin mere paas is cheez ka na approval nahi hai ki usme aapko conversion ki guarantee ke basis pe refund de sakte hain sir mujhe aapke business ke liye baki mujhe koi problem nahi thi aap to hamare customer hai sir aapko pareshan kar ke hume kya hi milega aap ye bhi samjhe na sir. Magar sir mujhe bahut dukh hai is baat ka ke man liya maine paisa kharch kiya bahut dukh hai. Thik hai aapka aapka paisa waste nahi hoga aapka at the end of the year jab aapka august mein renewal aayega aap samne mein bolenge aap logo ke sath jud ke maza aaya aur. Chalo sir aapka bhagwan bhala kare aap aise bol rahe ho to ishwar aapki ichcha puri kare dekho baat to hume de diya. Best hai aage kabhi hota hai. Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive promised business.

- Feels cheated due to lack of results.

- Received fraudulent calls after subscribing.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the refund policy.

- Executive highlighted the benefits of using services.

- Executive offered to optimize the catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will optimize catalog.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, fraud calls, catalog
